_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Redis-6
author: arvati@hotmail.com
description: Redis is an open source (BSD licensed), in-memory data structure store, used as a database, cache and message broker. It supports data structures such as strings, hashes, lists, sets, sorted sets with range queries, bitmaps, hyperloglogs, geospatial indexes with radius queries and streams.

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash

# Create needed directories
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.local/bin

# clean old folders from last install
rm -rf /mnt/server/.local/bin/* /mnt/server/.local/bin/.[a-zA-Z0-9]*

cd /mnt/server/

if [ ! -e /mnt/server/redis.conf ]; then
    curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/arvati/pterodactyl-eggs/master/database/redis/redis6.conf -o redis.conf
fi

echo "#!/bin/sh
/usr/local/bin/redis-server /home/container/redis.conf --save 60 1 --dir /home/container/ --bind 0.0.0.0 --port ${SERVER_PORT} --requirepass ${SERVER_PASSWORD} --maxmemory ${SERVER_MEMORY}mb --daemonize yes 
export REDISCLI_AUTH=${SERVER_PASSWORD}
echo \"Running\"
redis-cli -p ${SERVER_PORT} monitor
redis-cli -p ${SERVER_PORT} shutdown save
" > /mnt/server/.local/bin/start.sh
chmod +x /mnt/server/.local/bin/start.sh

sleep 5
echo -e "Install complete. Made this to not have issues."

variables.name: Redis Password
variables.description: The password redis should use to secure the server.
